definitions: situated in the west, or directed toward or facing the west

examples.text: there will be showers in some western areas

shortDefinitions: situated in west, or directed towards or facing west

definitions: (of a wind) blowing from the west.
living in or originating from the West, in particular Europe or the United States
shortDefinitions: living in or originating from West

definitions: relating to or characteristic of the West or its inhabitants
shortDefinitions: relating to or characteristic of West or its inhabitants

definitions: of or originating from the non-Communist states of Europe and North America in contrast to the Eastern bloc

examples.text: the President threatened to end Western aid for an oil pipeline in Siberia

shortDefinitions: of or originating from non-Communist states of Europe and North America in contrast to Eastern bloc

definitions: a film, television drama, or novel about cowboys in western North America, set especially in the late 19th and early 20th centuries.
shortDefinitions: film, television drama, or novel about cowboys in western North America
